com.conceptwave.scripting
Class CatalogItemItem

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItemItem

public class CatalogItemItem
extends CWScriptable

Defines different relationships between the current item and another item. Sorted externally by type and position

Method Detail

evaluateAllConditionByType

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object evaluateAllConditionByType(String ruleAssociationType,
                                                                   com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean returnMsgOn,
                                                                   com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer numberOfMsgs)
Evaluates rules of a certain type

Parameters:
ruleType - the rule type (e.g. "eligibility", "availability", "validation" or any custom types).
  • For validation rules, only "validation" is allowed.
  • For Boolean rules, ruleType can be a comma-delimited list (e.g. "eligibility,type1,type2")
    returnMessageOn - Boolean value to indicate when to return the message. By default it's false.
    numberOfMsgs - Number of messages returned. By default it's 1.
    Returns:
    Return value depends on the rule type
  • For validation rules, returns null if there are no validation errors, otherwise returns an ErrorList object
  • For eligibility, availability and other Boolean rules, returns true if all of the rules return true, false otherwise
    Examples in Javascript:
  • itemRelation.evaluateAllConditionByType("validation");
  • itemRelation.evaluateAllConditionByType("eligibility,customType"), where customType is a Boolean association type

    • getAssociationType
